message: Let's split it 50/50, it's a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not being generous!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not being too generous either!
You're not being generous, so I'll take what I want!
I'll give you a bigger share, but don't think you're getting everything!
You're not giving me enough, so I'll take most of it!
I'll give you a bigger share, but don't think you're getting everything! It's getting late in the game.
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting desperate!
I'll give you a big share, but I'm not giving up yet! It's almost the end of the game.
You're getting desperate, and I'm taking advantage of it!
I'll give you a big share, but I'm not giving up yet! It's almost the end of the game.
It's almost over, and I'm taking what's left!
